item.title: Washington just rewrote the geopolitical rules. Is Bangladesh ready?
item.description: In November 2025, Washington did something extraordinary, silently codifying the end of the world order that had shaped global politics since the end of the Cold War.

item.title: Phulbari coal, power crisis, and a dangerous revisionism
item.description: Regarding the Phulbari Open-Pit Coal Mining Project, the chief adviser's press secretary recently made a Facebook post suggesting that Bangladesh is facing a severe power crisis because coal at Phulbari was not extracted.

item.title: The gig economy’s convenience has an unseen toll
item.description: Bangladesh's gig economy, such as ride-sharing, food delivery, courier services, has mushroomed in the last decade.
